Articles.Content:
OK Boys and Girls!!

Spazer.net is proud to present a new range of 24/7 North America (Central) server choices!!!

*Links to KMPPartList.txt Download fixed - 11-15-2013 10:00 AM

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

KerbalSpace.Spazer.net:3411 - Bone Stock, no Mods

Stock KMPPartList.txt can be found here (you don't need it if you haven't modded before):

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B0behAKpYrPYckg4cGNlQThjaUE/edit?usp=sharing

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

KerbalSpace.Spazer.net:3412 - Stock with MechJeb

MechJeb Only KMPPartList.txt can be found here:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B0behAKpYrPYZjQ3cDBWeElhdDg/edit?usp=sharing

Required Mod can be found here:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/mechjeb/

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

KerbalSpace.Spazer.net:3413 - Heavily Modded

Modded KMPPartList.txt can be found here:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B0behAKpYrPYck9mMkpMMjdtTDQ/edit?usp=sharing

Required Mods for this server can be found here:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/mechjeb/

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/fustys-st...2-5m-crewtank/

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/common-be...cking-ports-2/

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kosmos-tks-spacecraft/

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/novapunch-remix-pack/

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/procedural-fairings/

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Instructions for Modded servers:

1. Download the updated KMPPartList.txt for the server you want to play on.

2. Rename the Downloaded file (the downloads are named for the server they belong to) to KMPPartList.txt.

3. Replace the Stock KMPPartList.txt file in your [KSP folder]\GameData\KMP\Plugins\PluginData\KerbalMultiPlayer Folder.

4. Download and install the required Mod packs.

5. LAUNCH!!!

The original KerbalSpace.Stock.Spazer.net:3411 address will still get you to the unmodded server (for a day or so at least!)

-BC

Edited November 15, 2013 by bcspazer

Does anyone managed to see player's kerbal face to face yet?? Or even watching a player landing??

Coz I was playing with a guy last night, we both landed on the moon and saw each other lander. However, we were unable to see each other kerbals walking. Is this a bug or just laggy?

Coz I was playing with a guy last night, we both landed on the moon and saw each other lander. However, we were unable to see each other kerbals walking. Is this a bug or just laggy?

Surface interactions aren't great atm, and (as I understand) it won't show the animations for the kerbal walking, it'll only show the position.

.1.3.1 makes some pretty big strides to (at the very least) keeping players connected

We won't be able to see player's kerbal at all or is it just because this is a early alpha build? Because I thought we would able to ''High-five during an EVA in orbit'' like the mod said.
Is there a proper tutorial on how to set up a KMP server?
can i use hamachi?

can i use hamachi?

Yup. Don't let people you don't know in though, they may be hax0rz.

Hi,

I have just setup a server on one of my dedicated servers located in london with a 1gbps connection

Server address: kmp.no-ip.biz:2076

Http: http://kmp.no-ip.biz:8081

Version: 0.1.3.1

Port: 2076

Num Players: 0/50

Updates per Second: 60

Inactive Ship Limit: 50

Screenshot Height: 512

Screenshot Save: True

Whitelisted: False
Hey is anyone else having issues in the VAB while on a server? Like when I pan the camera it freezes up in certain areas as well as when I move parts. Its making the game pretty near unplayable.

I'm having problems with my kmp server where players will get stuck in infinite synchronization

every ship seems to have loaded but it won't finish synch for some reason

I'm having trouble with mine- the server seems to keep reloading old debris that I've deleted, and when I try to launch, it spawns another copy of my ship inside itself on the pad- causing it to blow up and create more debris that I have to delete (because dekessler isn't working on it.) My friend is having the same issue.

Also, I can't click on any buttons on the main KMP window (clicking on them highlights them, but has no effect) and the sync button, chat button, and the playerlist are nonexistent.

Is there a proper tutorial on how to set up a KMP server?

Yes.

http://youtu.be/IjkSpYzAeJs

Next you should have multiple Space Centers so that each player can have their own launchpad, free to themselves. It also gives purpose to planes, and reduces the number of times that someone has a car on the runway, and the other players can't launch planes.

Next you should have multiple Space Centers so that each player can have their own launchpad, free to themselves. It also gives purpose to planes, and reduces the number of times that someone has a car on the runway, and the other players can't launch planes.

it doesnt need. bubble solve this problem.

I'm trying to do some bug hunting but I've hit a bit of a snag. Is anyone getting a "Connection Lost" error either going through the bubble, undocking, or sharing a screenshot?.

If so PM me, I need more people to help test and get a better idea of what is going on.

The Spazer.net servers now have their own thread (so this thread isn't spammed with server issues).

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/58328-Spazer-net-Kerbal-Multi-Player-Server-Information

3 servers operational now - more to be added if usage demands it!

-BC

I keep having this issue where I lose ownership of my own shuttles.... I now have 3 different space stations, each with the next piece right next to it but not docked because I lost ownership as I was trying to dock. The first 2, I have no idea what caused it. The last one, I pressed the "Switch To" button on the space station and then it put be back in the Tracking Station, and both the space station and the shuttle I was just in are locked (* next to it). Please fix this, it's very frustrating!
Could someone make a tutorial on how to start a kmp server with hamachi?

Is it possible to have ISA/Scansat, kethane and KMP play nice? I've been having troubles with these mods because every time I close and reopen ksp and connect to my server, it resets all the data and not only do I loose my maps, but the kethane deposits are different. Anyone know a way to fix this or will I have to go without?
